    • addPlayer

      public Player addPlayer(String playerName) throws NullPlayerNamesException, NullPlayerNameException, NullPlayerIdException, NullPlayerBookshelfException, NullPlayerScoreException, NullPlayerPrivateCardException, NullPlayerScoreBlocksException, DuplicatePlayerNameException, AlreadyInitiatedPatternException, FullGameException, NullAssignedPatternException
      Creates and adds a new player to the game. Position is randomly determined, as position in players list is the order in the game.
      Parameters:
      playerName - The player's name.
      Returns:
      The instance of created player.
      Throws:
      NullPlayerNamesException - If, while adding multiple players, the list of player names is null.
      AlreadyInitiatedPatternException - If assigning a pattern to a card that already has one.
      DuplicatePlayerNameException - If player with that name already exists.
      NullPlayerScoreBlocksException - If player's scoreblocks list is null.
      NullPlayerPrivateCardException - If player's private card object is null.
      NullPlayerScoreException - If player's score object is null.
      NullPlayerBookshelfException - If bookshelf is null.
      NullPlayerIdException - If player id is null.
      NullPlayerNameException - If player name is null.
      NullAssignedPatternException - If the pattern assigned to a card is null.
      FullGameException - If game is full, on player trying to join.

    • addPlayers

      public void addPlayers(List<Player> players) throws NullPlayerException, InvalidPlayersNumberException, DuplicatePlayerNameException
      Function that adds multiple players to game.
      Parameters:
      players - List of players to add.
      Throws:
      NullPlayerException - If player object is null.
      InvalidPlayersNumberException - If number of players to add is invalid.
      DuplicatePlayerNameException - If player with that name already exists.

    • setGameBoard

      public void setGameBoard() throws InvalidNumOfPlayersException, NullNumOfPlayersException
      GameBoard setter.
      Throws:
      InvalidNumOfPlayersException - If, while adding multiple players, there is an invalid number of them.
      NullNumOfPlayersException - If the number of players provided when filling the board is null.

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn() throws BookshelfGridColIndexOutOfBoundsException, BookshelfGridRowIndexOutOfBoundsException, NullIndexValueException, NullPlayerBookshelfException, NullScoreBlockListException, NullPointerException, NullMatchedBlockCountException, NegativeMatchedBlockCountException
      Method that computes active player's Score, updates the view, checks if game is over and if not picks next player.
      Throws:
      NullScoreBlockListException - If the list of scoreblocks is null.
      NullPlayerBookshelfException - If bookshelf is null.
      NullIndexValueException - If the index provided is null.
      BookshelfGridRowIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the bookshelf row index is out of bounds.
      BookshelfGridColIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the bookshelf column index is out of bounds.
      NegativeMatchedBlockCountException - If the number of matched blocks to set is negative.
      NullMatchedBlockCountException - If the number of matched blocks to set is null.
      NullPointerException - Generic NPE.

    • takeTileAction

      public Tile takeTileAction(Coordinates coord) throws BoardGridRowIndexOutOfBoundsException, BoardGridColIndexOutOfBoundsException, NullIndexValueException
      Function that allows the player to take a tile from the board.
      Parameters:
      coord - The coordinates of the tile.
      Returns:
      The tile of the board the player wants to take.
      Throws:
      BoardGridColIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the board column index is out of bounds.
      BoardGridRowIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the board row index is out of bounds.
      NullIndexValueException - If the index provided is null.

    • putTileAction

      public void putTileAction(Tile t, Coordinates coord) throws BookshelfGridColIndexOutOfBoundsException, BookshelfGridRowIndexOutOfBoundsException, NullIndexValueException, NullTileException
      Function that puts a tile inside the active player's bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      t - Tile taken from the board.
      coord - Coordinates of the bookshelf.
      Throws:
      BookshelfGridColIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the bookshelf column index is out of bounds.
      BookshelfGridRowIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the bookshelf row index is out of bounds.
      NullIndexValueException - If the index provided is null.
      NullTileException - If the tile is null.

    • checkEndGame

      public void checkEndGame()
      Function that checks if there's a player who completed their bookshelf and sets flags accordingly.

    • assignPlayers

      public void assignPlayers()
      Method that is called when all players joined the game and the first one should be picked. Can be used in tests to force starting a game before the players threshold is met.

    • getDisconnectedPlayersNum

      public Integer getDisconnectedPlayersNum()
      Simple helper function to get the number of disconnected players to discount when looking for available games.
      Returns:
      disconnected player num.

    • activePlayerMove

      public void activePlayerMove(Map<Coordinates,Coordinates> selectedCoordinates) throws BoardGridColIndexOutOfBoundsException, BoardGridRowIndexOutOfBoundsException, NullIndexValueException, BookshelfGridColIndexOutOfBoundsException, BookshelfGridRowIndexOutOfBoundsException, NullTileException, NullPlayerBookshelfException, NullScoreBlockListException, NullPointerException, NullMatchedBlockCountException, NegativeMatchedBlockCountException, WrongMovesNumberException, WrongGameBoardPicksException, WrongBookShelfPicksException, NullGameHandlerInstance
      Method that plays the active player's turn. It's important to understand the structure of the Hashmap, which allows to find a correspondence between the coordinates of the taken tile of the board and the coordinates of the player's bookshelf where he/she/they wants to put the taken tile in.

      Note that I'm assuming all the params given to the method are valid since the input validation will be implemented client side in the selection of those coordinates.

      Parameters:
      selectedCoordinates - Map containing the coordinates of selected tiles. from board as key and the corresponding coordinates of the active player bookshelf as value.
      Throws:
      BoardGridColIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the board column index is out of bounds.
      BoardGridRowIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the board row index is out of bounds.
      NullIndexValueException - If the index provided is null.
      BookshelfGridColIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the bookshelf column index is out of bounds.
      BookshelfGridRowIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the bookshelf row index is out of bounds.
      NullTileException - If the tile is null.
      NullPointerException - Generic NPE.
      NullPlayerBookshelfException - If bookshelf is null.
      NullScoreBlockListException - If the list of scoreblocks is null.
      NegativeMatchedBlockCountException - If the number of matched blocks to set is negative.
      NullMatchedBlockCountException - If the number of matched blocks to set is null.
      WrongBookShelfPicksException - If the game moves are invalid because of bookshelf placement.
      WrongGameBoardPicksException - If the game moves are invalid because of board picking.
      WrongMovesNumberException - If the game moves are in an illegal number.
      NullGameHandlerInstance - If the game handler is null.
